testsuite.name: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: When I click the New Unit button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: Then I see the "Add Unit" dialog open
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: When I enter a group name of "Test Unit 1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: And I click the "Add Unit" dialog button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: And I see that the "Test Unit 1" unit is visible in the "Assignments" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: Then I click the "Test Unit 1" unit in the Lessons and Assignments column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: Then I choose creating new assignment from dropdown button in "Test Unit 1" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: When enter Assignment name "Test Unit 1 Assignment"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: When I click on the questions tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: And I click the new question button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: And I create question "Unit Test 1 Question" with label "Unit Test 1 Question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: And I create a Mathematical Formula response area in the assignment question editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: Then verify the question caption text is "Unit Test 1 Question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: When I save & close the assignment on the questions page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: When I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: Then the new assignment "Test Unit 1 Assignment" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: And it is named as "Test Unit 1 Assignment" in "Test Unit 1" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: And I launch the "Test Unit 1 Assignment" assignment in "Test Unit 1" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: Then I save and quit the lesson
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: And I am back on the "Demonstration Class" class homepage window
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: And I assert the unit "Test Unit 1" is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: And I click on the "Test Unit 2 Assignment" module in the "Test Unit 2" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully create new units, add assignments and verify that those units are still displayed when the assignments are closed.
